title: Understanding Tracked Changes
text: Tracked changes allow you to see edits made to a document. This feature is often used in collaborative environments to review and approve changes.

title: Where to Find Tracked Changes
text: The 'Track Changes' feature is typically found under the 'Review' tab in most document editing software.

title: Selecting the Correct Option
text: Which option allows you to review tracked changes in a document?
choices: click select changes to accept or reject
hold down on a cell to see its past changes
